title: Border, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with 6 sided reworked border
provenance: ex-collection: Countess Valencia de Don Juan
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Band of Point d'Argentan with a design of floral sprays alternating with S-shaped bars and entwined by floral garlands. Fond: bride boucleé. Modes: point mignon, venises, réseau mouché, petit réseau, portes, gaze quadrillée.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with 6 sided reworked border. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-85.
